entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 04:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -8.0°C
Humidity: 86 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
